title: Hurricane Lisa Batters Belize as It Makes Landfall
description: The storm grew to hurricane strength on Wednesday. It had prompted hurricane and tropical storm warnings in parts of Belize, Guatemala and Mexico.
dc:creator: The New York Times

media:description: Flooding in Belize City, Belize, on Wednesday as the country braced for the arrival of Hurricane Lisa.
